coreAttributes.name: eye-patch
coreAttributes.description: A small patch, made from cloth, which is attached to an elastic band and designed to be worn around the head.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(fasten)] the eye patch around [npc.her] head, before moving it into place to cover [npc.her] [npc.eye].
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(fasten)] the eye patch around [npc2.namePos] head, before moving it into place to cover [npc2.her] [npc2.eye].
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(fasten)] the eye patch around [npc2.namePos] head, before moving it into place to cover [npc2.her] [npc2.eye].

displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.namePos] eye patch and roughly [npc.verb(pull)] it off.
